languages.text: {n}Разжалованный блюститель с видом побитой собаки взирает на злобно скалящуюся толпу под хохот избитого работника. Похоже, чужое несчастье веселит его куда сильнее, чем печалит собственный приговор.{/n}

{n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with the other's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Разжалованный блюститель с видом побитой собаки взирает на злобно скалящуюся толпу под хохот избитого работника. Похоже, чужое несчастье веселит его куда сильнее, чем печалит собственный приговор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with another's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}

{n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with the other's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre que hasta ahora había sido guardia, rodeado de miradas rencorosas, observa a la multitud con el ceño fruncido mientras el trabajador apaleado se ríe a carcajadas, mucho más satisfecho por la caída en desgracia de su agresor que preocupado por su propia sentencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with the other's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre que hasta ahora había sido guardia, rodeado de miradas rencorosas, observa a la multitud con el ceño fruncido mientras el trabajador apaleado se ríe a carcajadas, mucho más satisfecho por la caída en desgracia de su agresor que preocupado por su propia sentencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}解雇されたエンフォーサーは、恨めしげな視線に囲まれ、殴られた労働者が大笑いしているのを横目に、群衆をにらみつけた。労働者は自分の判決について考えるよりも、他人の不幸を喜んでいるように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with the other's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}解雇されたエンフォーサーは、恨めしげな視線に囲まれ、殴られた労働者が大笑いしているのを横目に、群衆をにらみつけた。労働者は自分の判決について考えるよりも、他人の不幸を喜んでいるように見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}被剥夺了职位的执法者被充满恶意的目光团团包围，他对人群怒目而视。至于那个挨打的工人则放声大笑起来，比起自己即将遭受的鞭刑，那个执法者遭受的不幸似乎更让他心满意足。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with the other's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}被剥夺了职位的执法者被充满恶意的目光团团包围，他对人群怒目而视。至于那个挨打的工人则放声大笑起来，比起自己即将遭受的鞭刑，那个执法者遭受的不幸似乎更让他心满意足。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der entlassene Enforcer, umringt von gehässigen Glotzern, blickt grimmig in die Menge, während der geschlagene Arbeiter schallend lacht, offenbar vom Pech des anderen weit mehr amüsiert als seine eigene Strafe fürchtend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with the other's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der entlassene Enforcer, umringt von gehässigen Glotzern, blickt grimmig in die Menge, während der geschlagene Arbeiter schallend lacht, offenbar vom Pech des anderen weit mehr amüsiert als seine eigene Strafe fürchtend.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cerné par les regards haineux, le prévôt déclassé foudroie la foule du regard alors que l'ouvrier malmené se met à rire à gorge déployée, visiblement plus réjoui par le malheur de son vis-à-vis qu'inquiet du sort qui l'attend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The discharged enforcer, surrounded by spiteful leers, glowers at the crowd as the beaten worker laughs uproariously, seemingly far more pleased with the other's misfortune than troubled by his own sentence.{/n}
